CorrectableUefiError.Description: Indicates that a correctable error was encountered.
CorrectableUefiError.Resolution: View the UEFI log from the BMC in /var/log/nN/current

CorrectableUefiMcaError.Description: Indicates that a correctable MCA error was encountered.
CorrectableUefiMcaError.Message: Correctable Machine Check Architecture %1 Error reported on Socket %2. %3

CorrectableUefiMcaMemoryError.Description: Indicates that a correctable MCA memory error was encountered.
CorrectableUefiMcaMemoryError.Message: Correctable Machine Check Architecture Memory Error: Bank %1 - Unified Memory Controller, Socket %2, DIMM %3. %4
CorrectableUefiMcaMemoryError.Resolution: Monitor this behavior for possible DIMM replacement.

FatalUefiAssertError.Description: Indicates that BIOS encountered an unrecoverable internal error.
FatalUefiAssertError.Message: BIOS Assert encountered on line %1 of file %2.
FatalUefiAssertError.Resolution: Update BIOS to latest released level. Capture the console log and contact vendor if problem persists.

FatalUefiBootError.Description: Indicates BIOS was unable to boot to the OS.
FatalUefiBootError.Resolution: Check that the boot device is functioning properly.

FatalUefiCpuError.Description: Indicates that an CPU error was encountered.
FatalUefiCpuError.Resolution: Reseat or replace the reported CPU.

FatalUefiError.Description: Indicates that a critical error was encountered.
FatalUefiError.Resolution: View the Uefi log from the BMC in /var/log/nN/current

FatalUefiFpgaTableError.Description: Indicates that an FPGA table error was encountered.
FatalUefiFpgaTableError.Message: BIOS to nC communication protocol error, unable to locate FPGA Information. FPGA %1 table not found.
FatalUefiFpgaTableError.Resolution: Update firmware to latest released levels. Capture the console log and contact vendor if problem persists.

FatalUefiFpgaTableVersionError.Description: Indicates that an FPGA table version error was encountered.
FatalUefiFpgaTableVersionError.Message: FPGA %1 table version mismatch, BIOS: %2, nC: %3.
FatalUefiFpgaTableVersionError.Resolution: Update firmware to latest released levels. Capture the console log and contact vendor if problem persists.

FatalUefiMcaError.Description: Indicates that a critical MCA error was encountered.
FatalUefiMcaError.Message: Machine Check Architecture %1 Error reported on Socket %2. %3
FatalUefiMcaError.Resolution: Reboot the system and if the problem persists contact your vendor for support and include a captured console log from the affected compute node.

FatalUefiMcaMemoryError.Description: Indicates that a critical MCA memory error was encountered.
FatalUefiMcaMemoryError.Message: Uncorrectable Machine Check Architecture Memory Error: Bank %1 - Unified Memory Controller, Socket %2, DIMM %3. %4
FatalUefiMcaMemoryError.Resolution: Reseat or replace the reported DIMM.

FatalUefiMemoryError.Description: Indicates that a memory error was encountered.
FatalUefiMemoryError.Resolution: Reseat or replace the reported DIMM

FatalUefiSmmbAllocateError.Description: Indicates that a BIOS to nC communication protocol error was encountered.
FatalUefiSmmbAllocateError.Message: BIOS to nC communication protocol error unable to allocate memory for the BIOS SMMB copy buffer.
FatalUefiSmmbAllocateError.Resolution: Update firmware to latest released levels. Capture the console log and contact vendor if problem persists.

FatalUefiSmmbFpgaError.Description: Indicates that a BIOS to nC communication protocol error was encountered.
FatalUefiSmmbFpgaError.Message: BIOS to nC communication protocol error, unable to locate FPGA Information.
FatalUefiSmmbFpgaError.Resolution: Update firmware to latest released levels. Capture the console log and contact vendor if problem persists.

FatalUefiSmmbInstallError.Description: Indicates that a BIOS to nC communication protocol error was encountered.
FatalUefiSmmbInstallError.Message: BIOS to nC communication protocol error, unable to install SMMB protocol.
FatalUefiSmmbInstallError.Resolution: Update firmware to latest released levels. Capture the console log and contact vendor if problem persists.

FatalUefiSmmbRetryError.Description: Indicates that a BIOS to nC communication protocol error was encountered.
FatalUefiSmmbRetryError.Message: BIOS to nC communication error. The SMMB %1 command failed to complete after the maximum number of retries.
FatalUefiSmmbRetryError.Resolution: Update firmware to latest released levels. Capture the console log and contact vendor if problem persists.

FatalUefiUndefinedError.Description: Indicates that a reported early initialization error was not recognized.
FatalUefiUndefinedError.Message: Undefined error %1 encountered during early BIOS initialization.
FatalUefiUndefinedError.Resolution: Reboot the system and if problem persists capture the console log and contact the vendor.

GeneralUefiError.Description: Indicates that a UEFI error was encountered.
GeneralUefiError.Resolution: View the UEFI log from the BMC in /var/log/nN/current

NonFatalUefiBootError.Description: Indicates that a selected boot device failed to boot an OS.
NonFatalUefiBootError.Message: Boot device %1 failed to boot an OS.
NonFatalUefiBootError.Resolution: Check that the boot device is functioning properly.

NonFatalUefiDegradedCpuInterconnectError.Description: Indicates that the CPU Interconnect is not running at the Expected Speed Capacity.
NonFatalUefiDegradedCpuInterconnectError.Message: CPU Interconnect is not running at the Expected Speed Capacity: %1 GT/s, Actual: %2 GT/s.
NonFatalUefiDegradedCpuInterconnectError.Resolution: Replace one or both processors. If problem persists capture the console log and contact the vendor.

NonFatalUefiDegradedMemorySpeedError.Description: Indicates that a degraded memory speed condition was encountered.
NonFatalUefiDegradedMemorySpeedError.Message: DIMM %1 is not capable of expected speed of %2 MHz.
NonFatalUefiDegradedMemorySpeedError.Resolution: Reseat or replace the reported DIMM Device(s).

NonFatalUefiDegradedPcieDeviceError.Description: Indicates that a degraded PCIe device was encountered.
NonFatalUefiDegradedPcieDeviceError.Message: PCIe device %1 Vendor ID:%2  Device ID:%3  Bus%4:Device%5:Function%6 is degraded, Expected Speed Capacity: Gen%7 Actual: Gen%8, Expected Width Capacity:%9 Actual:%10.
NonFatalUefiDegradedPcieDeviceError.Resolution: Reseat or replace the reported PCIe Device.

NonFatalUefiDegradedUnknownMemorySpeedEr.Description: Indicates that a degraded memory speed condition was encountered.
NonFatalUefiDegradedUnknownMemorySpeedEr.Message: DIMM memory speed degraded due to unknown reason.

NonFatalUefiError.Description: Indicates that a non-fatal error was encountered.
NonFatalUefiError.Resolution: View the UEFI log from the BMC in /var/log/nN/current

NonFatalUefiMismatchedDimmSizesError.Description: Indicates that not all DIMMs are the same size.
NonFatalUefiMismatchedDimmSizesError.Message: DIMM memory is composed of mismatched DIMM sizes.

NonFatalUefiMissingCpuDeviceError.Description: Indicates that a missing or failed to train CPU device condition was encountered.
NonFatalUefiMissingCpuDeviceError.Message: CPU missing or failed to train, Count Expected: %1, Actual: %2.
NonFatalUefiMissingCpuDeviceError.Resolution: Reseat, replace or add the reported CPU.

NonFatalUefiMissingMemoryError.Description: Indicates that a missing or failed to train DIMM condition was encountered.
NonFatalUefiMissingMemoryError.Message: DIMM %1: Socket %2 Channel %3: Missing or failed to train.
NonFatalUefiMissingMemoryError.Resolution: Reseat, replace or add the reported DIMM.

NonFatalUefiMissingPcieDeviceError.Description: Indicates that a missing or failed to train PCIe device condition was encountered.
NonFatalUefiMissingPcieDeviceError.Message: PCIe device %1 is missing or failed to train.
NonFatalUefiMissingPcieDeviceError.Resolution: Reseat, replace or add the reported PCIe Device.

NonFatalUefiOptionError.Description: Indicates a problem with BIOS option.
NonFatalUefiOptionError.Resolution: Reset BIOS options to default, and then reapply any desired BIOS option update.

NonFatalUefiPpinError.Description: Indicates that BIOS was unable to read the processor PPIN.
NonFatalUefiPpinError.Message: BIOS unable to read processor PPIN from CPU%1. Status: %2.

NonFatalUefiSmmbCommError.Description: Indicates that a BIOS-nC communication error was encountered.
NonFatalUefiSmmbCommError.Message: BIOS-nC communication error. The SMMB %1 command was not communicated between BIOS and the nC.
NonFatalUefiSmmbCommError.Resolution: Update firmware to latest released levels. Capture the console log and contact vendor if problem persists.

PreviousBootCorrectableUefiMcaError.Description: Indicates that a correctable MCA error was encountered on the previous boot.
PreviousBootCorrectableUefiMcaError.Message: Correctable Machine Check Architecture %1 Error, reported on Socket %2 was encountered on previous boot. %3
PreviousBootCorrectableUefiMcaError.Resolution: It is possible that this was caused by a condition encountered by the OS, check the console log for analysis.

PreviousBootCorrectableUefiMcaMemoryErro.Description: Indicates that a correctable MCA memory error was encountered on the previous boot.
PreviousBootCorrectableUefiMcaMemoryErro.Message: Correctable Machine Check Architecture Memory Error: Bank %1 - Unified Memory Controller, Socket %2, DIMM %3 encountered on previous boot. %4
PreviousBootCorrectableUefiMcaMemoryErro.Resolution: It is possible that this was caused by a condition encountered by the OS, check the console log for analysis.

PreviousBootFatalUefiMcaError.Description: Indicates that a critical MCA error was encountered on the previous boot.
PreviousBootFatalUefiMcaError.Message: Machine Check Architecture %1 Error, reported on Socket %2, was encountered on previous boot. %3
PreviousBootFatalUefiMcaError.Resolution: It is possible that this was caused by a condition encountered by the OS, check the console log for analysis.

PreviousBootFatalUefiMcaMemoryError.Description: Indicates that a critical MCA memory error was encountered on the previous boot.
PreviousBootFatalUefiMcaMemoryError.Message: Uncorrectable Machine Check Architecture Memory Error: Bank %1 - Unified Memory Controller, Socket %2, DIMM %3 encountered on previous boot. %4
PreviousBootFatalUefiMcaMemoryError.Resolution: It is possible that this was caused by a condition encountered by the OS, check the console log for analysis.

PreviousBootUefiError.Description: Indicates that a previous boot error was encountered.
PreviousBootUefiError.Resolution: View the UEFI log from the BMC in /var/log/nN/current

SMMBPingTimeout.Message: The SMMB ping has timed out on node %1 with a timeout of %2
SMMBPingTimeout.Resolution: Ensure the UEFI firmware is flashed correctly and retry the node power up operation.

Name: Cray Uefi Message Registry
